name: AI WhatsApp Commerce - Chat Center
description:
Integrate ChatGPT to WhatsApp and sell 24/7

Chat Center integrates your eCommerce platform or internal systems and your WhatsApp line with Artificial Intelligence, turning your WhatsApp channel into a powerful sales channel.

With your WhatsApp integrated to your eCommerce, you'll be able to assist your customers, suggest products, create carts and send payment links 24 hours a day.

In addition to WhatsApp Commerce capabilities, our platform includes functionalities to recover abandoned carts by WhatsApp, perform WhatsApp Marketing campaigns and automate FAQs and order statuses.
focus_areas: WhatsApp Commerce: WhatsApp AI Stores integrated to your eCommerce
Abandoned cart recovery: recover lost sales through WhatsApp
WhatsApp Marketing: send marketing campaigns to your customers
